items.title: Suspect dead after active shooter incident outside Border Patrol building
items.description: A suspect is dead following an active shooter incident at the entrance of the Border Patrol sector annex in McAllen, Texas.

items.title: Texas flooding victims: From campers to parents, what we know about the lives lost
items.description: Young campers and a dad saving his family were among the dozens killed in the historic flash floods that tore through central Texas over the holiday w...

items.title: WATCH:  How heavy rain caused catastrophic flooding in Texas
items.description: ABC News Chief Meteorologist Ginger Zee shares how the fast flood threat developed so quickly and how early people were warned about the dangers.

items.title: 3 dead, 10 injured in South Philadelphia shooting; person is in custody, police say
items.description: Authorities say three people were killed and 10 others injured in a shooting

items.title: White House suggests some countries could see tariff deadline shifted
items.description: The chair of the White House Council of Economic Advisers said that some countries that are negotiating with the U.S. could see tariffs delayed.
